trends: There has been one other sighting in Rockport
There were no other sightings in Rockport on or around October 24th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWhat I thought was a satellite, only it was too big, too bright , and moving too quick, from east to se quickly. It then just disappeared, yet all the stars around it were still bright. (No cloud) perhaps it changed direction?
Summary: What I thought was a bright huge satellite seemed too large and the movement was to fast, there was a dull red light below object, it then disappeared. Not behind a night cloud, as all the stars there were still bright.(perhaps changed direction.)
